评论概述: Great fire-resistant shirt for welding or other hot work
评论详情: I absolutely love these shirts, they are great for welding and grinding. I have been welding for about 15 years now and I've seen plenty of different options for keeping fire off you. This is definitely a favorite of mine, the material is still light enough to work in comfortably while keeping you safe. I have never been one to wear leathers I'll stick weld in a t shirt when it gets too hot out lol. These shirts are a great medium tough and I have nothing but good experiences after months of use. The size is a little off and I would order a size down next time and that's the only reason for taking a star off. I would almost compare these to the little green jackets everyone always wears with a little flair to them. Even after multiple wash cycles it is still flame resistant and I've even done some overhead welding with this shirt. I seriously have nothing but good things to say about these shirts besides the size and have suggested them to all my friends. If you are looking for a nice light material to do hot work I fully suggest these shirts!!!
Excellent value.  This shirt is made way better than I expected.  A really good value.
Had holes and burns the first day worn

评论概述: Fits as expected, soft and comfortable, haven't ignited so far!
评论详情: This shirt fit as expected, it is soft and comfortable to wear, while it may not be the most stylish or flattering shirt it is great to wear and serves its purpose! I have used it to do some welding and had spatter fly up and hit the shirt and it didn't burn or catch fire whereas my non-fire-retardant shirt that I have used for welding would turn brown and small little holes would appear when welding spatter hit it! Overall does a great job at keeping me from being burnt and keeps me safe. I also used it for some serious grinding, and it held up great for that when the sparks hit the shirt.

The thick material of this shirt definitely adds that extra layer of protection when I weld. The shirt is thick and pretty comfortable. I wear an extra large and it seems to be pretty true to size. 评论概述: Now when i weld I look great
评论详情: I ordered this welding shirt for when i am doing certain types of welding where sparks could set my clothes on fire even with leather apron and welding gloves.  This shirt looks great, fits well and is very comfortable.  Now I look great when welding and wish my welds looked this good.

This is a long sleeve shirt made to be fire resistant. It is the type of clothing that is approved for firefighters, especially those fighting the wild fire, in need of warm clothing. It is completely comfortable and it does not seem like something that would be fire rated, but it is. It includes a nice beige and brown design with flames on it, and has the letters FR on the pocket to designate its flame retardant status  Overall this shirt is great for a normal, relatively heavy long sleeve shirt. And the fact that it can potentially protect you from wildfires adds to the desirable. It also includes a button and additional patch of material; if you tear this shirt you can still have protection from the flames.

4 stars Fits as expected. Ordered a Large for a 6'5 210lb man. Shirt is comfortable to wear and does its job for welding projects. Launders well. Slight stretch is nice to maneuver easily when working.

When your girl asks to learn to weld, you say, "absolutely!"  So safety first requires proper gear.  This shirt is a great combination of form and function.  I intentionally purchased it a bit too big.  It fit exactly as expected. It is well made with good coverage for her safety; It is super soft too.
These seem to run slightly large.  The material is thick but soft.  The cuffs are tight so they'll keep flying sparks out of your sleeves.  I would still order your usual size.

Got a 2X and I will say it was a little bigger then I would imagine a 2X didn't fit at all way to big. Also the pocket does not line up. 3 star is because didn't exact fit the size and the pocket. Material and design is good loved it.

My son is in welding school right now and is always burning little holes in his t-shirts (since he often forgets his large jacket). This shirt is a great way for him to get a quick weld done without damaging his clothes. It fits nicely and is really comfortable. He can layer it under his leather welding jacket for added protection.

评论概述: Good Protective Shirt with just right coverage
评论详情: I'm 6'1" 190 lbs and the Large size fits me just right.  It is very comfortable and comforting protection from hot stuff.  A sample swatch was included and I tested it with direct flame from a butane torch as shown in the video.

I'm currently working on a 1936 Chevrolet project. This shirt is thick and keeps me from getting burned on the arms or sunburned while welding. Unfortunately the shirt is hot to work in, but that's all FRC clothing. There's nothing that can be done about that because FRC is so thick. The shirt is great quality and all the stitching looks great. The cut feels great without being to baggy. Honestly the color combination isn't something I would just wear around town. It's great for protection while welding in the home shop though.

I ordered an XL for my husband he usually wears a Large, but this goes down a little further providing extra protection. The material is soft and the design is unique. As far as flame retardant, he uses this to weld and didn’t have any burn holes.

I got a medium to work around the house in and it fit perfectly [see photo showing shoulder seam location]. I like the squared-off bottom – it looks good worn outside the pants [see front and back photos] as well as tucked in. The ribbed cuffs give the shirt a finished look. I also liked the chest pocket. I’m always looking for a place to put my glasses. The one I selected didn’t have a sleeve pocket. Not sure I missed much. The shirt fit well, was warm, comfortable and met my expectations I recommend it.

Very heavy duty and Thick shirt. Definitely good for welding. It also looks very good on and fit my husband very well. I think this would be a great option for people needing clothes for welding. It seems to be made well and we didn’t notice any problems with stitching or sewing.
This is very thick long sleeve shirt, but I don't like the design!

评论概述: This is a nice shirt to wear while welding.
评论详情: I weld occasionally and I typically will destroy the shirt that I am wearing because I don’t take the time to change my clothes.  This shirt wears well, its not to warm and it has long sleeves. If I’m going to destroy a shirt at least it should be fire proof?  I’m going to like wearing this shirt when I weld.

The Handsome body fitting shirt will show off your Handsome figure with style. It is made of 100 percent cotton for cool days to keep you warm and absorbs all of that sweat during warm breezy days that make you desire to wear long sleeves. It feels good on the body most of all, whereas you do not have to wear a T-shirt underneath is you choose not to. On the cool days you will be warm with a T-Shirt underneath.

I do hobby welding. Even though this isn’t a full time occupation I try to work safely using full PPE (Personal Protective Equipment). My mindset comes from my prior experience as a manufacturing production manager which included the role of OSHA regulations enforcer … and my wife demands that I do everything as safely as possible.  So I have a heavy cotton canvas welding jacket that I wear when welding. But especially since we moved to a warmer climate with almost constant high humidity levels, that jacket becomes uncomfortably hot if worn for very long.  So when I came across this cotton welding shirt with a high neckline, long sleeves, and tight knitted cuffs, I grabbed it. It is much lighter and cooler than the jacket. It provides flame resistant coverage of all areas with potentially exposed skin.  It hasn’t yet turned hot here yet, but I suspect that this will become the basis my year ‘round welding uniform (with a full length leather apron over it) at least for all those projects worked on inside my workshop.

This is a comfortable shirt. Material is soft and stretchy. I am an average L, and the fit is great. Arm length perfect. Body an inch or two longer than most. The print is wild and in my opinion unprofessional. I would have preferred a shirt without print, but only print was available. No reinforcements or special stitching.

评论概述: HABERDASHERY EXCELLENCE - BE HAPPY -  YOUTHFUL LOOKING GLAD RAG
评论详情: This is a wonderful shirt. Well made, tailored to fit as near perfect as could be imagined. The shirt has made a number of ly public appearances and elicited responses from others, mostly women. All favorable. The guys that I know are a little more conservative with the compliments, but they will be more direct with a question, such as, "Where did you get that shirt?"  Obviously, it did not come from Lake Titicaca or the Island there but it is a great imagination provoking name.I enjoy telling my friends that it is a i like telling them it is a Titticaca Ca Ca, and that it is flame, flash, retardant.I have hand laundered the shirt twice in my bathtub hung it up on a hanger to dry. It dries quickly, and with nary a wrinkle.  Great shirt, bright beautiful colors and design for everyday wear, or wear it to make a grand statement about your youth and vitality. Let this fashionable shirt tell everyone that you are connected with life and the life around you. It did that for me.  If you are a senior and this shirt strikes your fancy then keep in mind this old adage that is very apropos. "You are only as old as you feel!" Therefore, let this shirt contribute to that wonderful feeling.  Really, a perfect shirt for wearing almost anywhere. Nice soft comfortable cotton fabric, warm with long cuffed sleeves. No drafts allowed. (:-))))  A pleasure to wear, test, and review. It is also a pleasure to give it the Five BIG Stars that it deserves.  In my opinion this Titicaca FR (flame resistant) shirt is a good value. Get it, to feel good while looking good.
I wear a 16.5 34/35 dress shirt.  I ordered a large and the shirt fits good.  Roomy without being too big.  The shirt weight is like a heavy shirt/light sweatshirt.
Nice, well made, decent looking shirt. Would recommend.

I was excited to get this for my husband to use when welding. I won't have to worry so much about accidental burns.  The shirt material is really nice.  We were pleasantly surprised by the size - it is what it says!  We ordered up to make sure it would fit and could have ordered his regular size.

Perfect fit shirt.  I normally wear a large shirt and I ordered a large shirt.  Great fit.  It is a soft cotton and comfortable fitting shirt.  The material is heavier than regular shirts and it is labeled as flame retardant.  I am not going to put a flame to it to test it.  It has a low collar but your welding hood should cover your neck.  I would have liked it better if it had a collar that protected your neck but it has never been a problem in the past.  The shirt looks good if fashion is important when you are welding.  The shirt is so nice, I will probably still wear something over it because I don’t want to take the chance of ruining the shirt.  Compared to the traditional flame retardant shirts this is priced very good.
Only thing i didnt like was the color. I ordered a grey shirt but the shirt had a more greenish tone to it...not quite the color inwas expecting

This shirt is nice and soft, making it comfortable to wear. I've worn it in warm weather, and was pleased that it wasn't very hot to wear either. The shirt comes with a little swatch of the fabric it's made from, allowing you to verify that it doesn't catch fire. It will burn slowly and turn to ash while it's held in a flame, but as soon as you take the flame away it stops burning. So it will be good for welding, though not as protective as a welding jacket.
Great fit. Well made. I’ll be ordering more!

评论概述: Review: Titcaca Henley Shirt  Exec Summary: A gift but one that is loved!  High recommend!
评论详情: I ordered this Henley shirt as a gift for my son and I usually don't order for him.  He's 20 and very specific in his tastes.  In this case, I liked the look (as far as I could tell on Amazon!) and ordered it for him.He loves it.  He tried it on immediately and he's worn it a dozen times since he got it.  The shirt is well made, comfortable and easy to wash/clean.  He (and I) like the look and he may be ordering more from this company.I went looking for details about who made the shirt.  I wasn't able to find much.  Their products are well regarded (they have an average 4.73 out of 5 for their product reviews) and while there is a poorly written note about their branding on one of their product pages, my son really LIKES the shirt.  High recommend if you are considering purchase.
Perfect fit and comfort

Excellent shirt. Fits as expected and makes it thru a wash just fine. It has the FR patch so you are clear for duty in an extremely comfortable shirt. It is flexible material and gives you full range of motion. The buttons make it easy to adjust to your neck diameter also.
